sentence.Network_en: The office is a menagerie of egotists and sycophants.
sentence.Network_cn: 该办公室乃是自私者与谄媚者汇集之处.

sentence.Network_en: " Well, he certainly must have strained himself to get this menagerie together. "
sentence.Network_cn: “ 我说, 他一定花了很大的气力才搜罗到这么一大帮牛头马面. ”

sentence.Network_en: They followed it this time, as eager as children in sight of a circus menagerie.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一次他们跟着它前进了, 那种迫切的心情就象孩子见了马戏团里巡回动物园一样.

list.abs: ... . . .其激情的演出和优美的舞姿征服了在场的所有观众，并获得一致好评。05年外文节，麦田剧社的又一英语力作《Glass menagerie（玻璃动物园）》再一次作为外文节的压轴大戏，在相辉堂成功上演。04级的李姗姗和李晨彪2位同学在剧中演绎了一段感人至.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from French ménagerie, from ménage (see ménage)

entry.tran: (私人豢养或向公众展览的)一群野生动物
entry.def: A menagerie is a collection of wild animals.

means.word_mean: 1. a collection of live animals for study or display
2. the facility where wild animals are housed for exhibition
